item.title: WATCH | GI tagged Gadwal Saree
item.description:
<![CDATA[Travel
WATCH | GI tagged Gadwal Saree
Sponsored | Discover the elegance of Telangana through the beautiful Gadwal Saree. Known for their delicate cotton base and luxurious silk borders, these handwoven zari sarees are a treasure cherished by generations. With intricate zari work and timeless motifs, each Gadwal saree is an unforgettable addition to any wardrobe. Wrap yourself in the charm of Telangana's rich culture....]]>
